description:
Discover the wisdom of the founding fathers through intriguing puzzles featuring quotes from the visionaries who shaped a nation. 
Test your knowledge of famous Americans as you unravel clues and unlock fascinating anecdotes about iconic figures who left an indelible mark on history.
Immerse yourself in the beauty of America's landscapes through mesmerizing jigsaw puzzles featuring breathtaking locations from sea to shining sea.

Features:
- Pick and play any level!
- Beautiful soundtrack!
- 16 types of subgames!
- Make gameplay easier with the Hint function!
- Trivia about the USA!

This Collector's Edition features 39 extra levels!

With every challenge, Stars, Stripes, and Subgames ensures a patriotic celebration of American heritage, culture, and ingenuity.
name: Stars, Stripes and Subgames Collector's Edition
intro: Immerse yourself in a world of subgames captivating and diverse subgames!
